description.text: Submodel containing data retention policies for data elements in the Asset Administration Shell.
Reference to a DataRetentionPolicies Submodel whose policies are extended or changed by the policies defined in this Submodel.
Defines the set of policies.
Describes a single data retention policy.
Specifies how long an element must be retained before it can be deleted.
References to semantic identifiers of elements that this policy shall apply to.
Reference to a semantic identifier of an element that this policy shall apply to.
Establishes a relationship with a policy that is being overridden by this policy.
Specifies whether the policy is immutable.
Legal name of the entity who created the policy.
Timestamp of when the policy was created.
Legal name of the entity that issued the policy.
Describes the source of a policy.
Identifier of the source.
Reference to an external file representing the policy source.
Link to an external source.
Reference to a source in the same or an external Asset Administration Shell.
Date and time that the policy is valid from.
Date and time until when the policy is valid.
Activity log of changes to the policy.
An activity related to the policy.
Time when the change was made.
Username or legal name of the entity that made the change.
Description of the action taken.
Reason for the change.
Signature of the Policy after the change was made.
Reference to a DataRetentionPolicies Submodel whose policies are extended or changed by the policies defined in this Submodel.

definition.text: Reference to a DataRetentionPolicies Submodel whose policies are extended or changed by the policies defined in this Submodel.
Defines the set of policies.
Describes a single data retention policy.
Specifies how long an element must be retained before it can be deleted.
References to semantic identifiers of elements that this policy shall apply to.
References to semantic identifiers of elements that this policy shall apply to.
Establishes a relationship with a policy that is being overridden by this policy.
Specifies whether the policy is immutable.
Legal name of the entity who created the policy.
Timestamp of when the policy was created.
Legal name of the entity that issued the policy.
Identity of the policy source within the context of the issuer.
Identifier of the source (e.g., DOI).
Reference to an external file representing the policy source (e.g., contract document).
Link to an external source (e.g., web page).
Reference to a source in the same or an external Asset Administration Shell.
Date and time that the policy is valid from.
Date and time until when the policy is valid.
Contains the activity log of changes to the policy
An activity related to the policy
Time when the change was made
Username or legal name of the entity that made the change.
Description of the action taken.
Reason for the change.
Signature of the Policy after the change was made
